instruction: Could you help me merge all PDF files in the "Paper Recommendation" email attachment in Thunderbird into one file and upload it to attachment_full.pdf in Google Drive?

minimal: `CLICK` on Thunderbird icon to open it (if not already open)
`CLICK` on the "Paper Recommendation" email to open it
`CLICK` on the Chrome tab with Google Drive open
`CLICK` the "+ New" button (or similar icon for uploading files)
batched: `CLICK` on Thunderbird icon to open it (if not already open)
`CLICK` on the "Paper Recommendation" email to open it
`CLICK` on the Chrome tab with Google Drive open
`CLICK` the "+ New" button (or similar icon for uploading files)
